caption: This is one lovely bridge. Period. On one side you can admire the mini statute of liberty and the eiffel tower and on the other a hot air balloon on top of the river seine. There are benches on both sides. Don't forget to checkout the 4 statues that adorn the feet of the bridge.
A very beautiful view the Eiffel Tower, very close to the Beaugrenelle mall and cinemas.
Beautiful bridge with amazing view of the Eiffel Tower.
Great place for a picturesque view of the Statue of Liberty with Eiffel Tower on the background. Easily accessible through Line 10.
Nice bridge with a great view on the Eiffel Tower and the Statue of Liberty

At the heart of Paris lies a hidden gem that truly captures the essence of the City of Light. The Pont Mirabeau, a stunning bridge over the Seine, is a must-see for anyone visiting the city.  As soon as you step onto the bridge, you're surrounded by breathtaking views of the Seine and the surrounding Parisian architecture. The ambiance is serene and tranquil, perfect for a peaceful stroll or a romantic evening walk. The service is non-existent, but that's okay because the beauty of the bridge speaks for itself.  The bridge itself is a masterpiece, featuring intricate designs and impressive engineering. What sets it apart from other bridges in Paris is its historical significance as it was the inspiration for one of Guillaume Apollinaire's most famous poems. This adds a unique layer of depth to the experience, making it truly special.  I cannot think of any criticisms for this place as it is simply stunning in every way. However, if I had to suggest one improvement, it would be to add more lighting to the bridge at night to enhance the views even further.  I am grateful for the opportunity to experience the Pont Mirabeau and highly recommend it to anyone visiting Paris. This place left an impression on me that will last a lifetime, and I am likely to return again and again.
Nice place in Paris city, it's close to the Eifel torn, a lot of people come to this place specially in summer.

Very nice bridge in a special yellow color with pretty statues and nice view over high buildings on the bank and Eiffel tower. I recommend to take a short walk to André Citroën park nearby and maybe stroll along Seine up to Eiffel tower.

A solid and sturdy bridge, gets you from one side of the river to the other conveniently. Also has good ornamentation which makes the bridge experience generally more positive.
